actions.command: age_of_exile stat give @s exact spell_fire_damage GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe1 10 10
age_of_exile stat give @s exact mana GLOBAL_INCREASE origin_aoe2 5 5
age_of_exile stat give @s exact all_water_damage FLAT origin_aoe3 -20 -20
age_of_exile stat give @s exact water_resist FLAT origin_aoe4 -25 -25
age_of_exile stat give @s exact fire_dot_damage FLAT origin_aoe5 20 20
age_of_exile stat give @s exact chance_of_burn FLAT origin_aoe6 33 33

name: 능력치
